BOARD OF VISITORS. CHAPMAN JOHNSON, Rector. JOSEPH C. CABELL, CHAPMAN JOHNSON, JOHN H. COCKE, THOMAS JEFF. RANDOLPH, JAMES M. MASON, WM. C. RIVES, SAMUEL TAYLOR. Secretary of the Board, FRANK CARR.

FACULTY AND OFFICERS. HENRY St. GEORGE TUCKER, Chairman of the Faculty, GESSNER HARRISON, Professor of Ancient Languages, CHARLES KRAITSER, Professor of Modern Languages. EDWARD H. COURTENAY, Professor of Mathematics. WM. B. ROGERS, Professor of Natural Philosophy. ROBERT E. ROGERS, Professor of Chemistry and Mat. Med. GEORGE TUCKER, Professor of Moral Philosophy. HENRY HOWARD, Professor of Physiology, Medicine, Obstetrics and Medi cal Jurisprudence. HENRY ST. GEORGE TUCKER, Professor of Law. JAMES L. CABELL, Professor of Anatomy and Surgery. WM. WERTENBAKER. Librarian and Secretary of the Faculty. WILLIS H. WOODLEY, Proctor. ALEXANDER GARRETT, Bursar. Rev. E. G. ROBINSON, Chaplain.

CATALOGUE OF STUDENTS. TWENTIETH SESSION.—1843-1844. ABBREVIATIONS. A. L.—Ancient Languages. M. L.—Modern Languages. M.—Mathematics. N. P.—Natural Philosophy. LAW.—Law. C.—Chemistry. M. P.—Moral Philosophy. MED.—Medicine. A. & S.—Anatomy & Surgery. NAMES. RESIDENCES. SCHOOLS ATTENDED. SES Alexander, Mark, jr. Lunenburg co., Va. C, M P, LAW, 1 Allison, Samuel P.
